thought: To craft nether_bricks, I need to first craft 4 nether_brick, which requires smelting 4 netherrack. I will start by smelting the first netherrack at slot 17 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 17 to slot 11 with quantity 1
